channel.title: Comments on: Swear on your Simple Machines Seven Inches

item.title: By: Arthur Seaton
item.dc:creator: Arthur Seaton
item.description: Congrats on your Idolator shout-out! Now maybe more people can check out your awesome blog.
item.content:encoded: Congrats on your Idolator shout-out! Now maybe more people can check out your awesome blog.

item.title: By: K
item.dc:creator: K
item.description: Yeah, I caught that, too. So bizarre. Entertaining, but bizarre.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I caught that, too. So bizarre. Entertaining, but bizarre.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: not to mention rufus' equally obscure buffalo tom reference whilst in bed with lily. so weird.
item.content:encoded: not to mention rufus’ equally obscure buffalo tom reference whilst in bed with lily. so weird.
